remarks.format: ## Remarks Questa classe rappresenta i ruoli dell'utente corrente.This class represents the roles of the current user. ## Examples Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come utilizzare i membri del classe.The following example shows the use of members of the class. span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from a user identity and an array of role names to which the user represented by that identity belongs.
